trans-unit.source: Exposes <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeView"></xref> types to UI Automation.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewAutomationPeer"></xref> class.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeView"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewAutomationPeer"></xref>.

Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer"></xref> for a data item in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items"></xref> collection of this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeView"></xref>.
The data item that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
A new instance of the for item.
Gets the control type for the <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
Called by <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.Tree"></xref> enumeration value.

Gets the collection of child elements of the <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
Called by <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren"></xref>.

A collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewItemAutomationPeer"></xref> elements, or `null` if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeView"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewAutomationPeer"></xref> is empty.
Gets the name of the <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
Called by <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName"></xref>.
A string that contains "TreeView".
Gets the control pattern for the <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
One of the enumeration values.
The current instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewItemAutomationPeer"></xref>, or `null`.
Gets a value that specifies whether the UI Automation provider allows more than one child element to be selected concurrently.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider> interface.
`true` if multiple selection is allowed; otherwise `false`.
Retrieves a UI Automation provider for each child element that is selected.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider> interface.
A collection of UI Automation providers.
Gets a value that specifies whether the UI Automation provider requires at least one child element to be selected.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider> interface.
`true` if selection is required; otherwise `false`.
